Detailed Description

nano AES coprocessor features.

Nano: AES coprocessor functionality. Key initialization and buffer en/decryption. Uses CBC mode.

Function Documentation

void aes_crypt ( uint8_t  mode,
buffer_t *  buffer 
)

Encrypt/decrypt buffer.

Parameters:
mode 0=encrypt, 1=decrypt
buffer buffer to en/decrypt

void aes_init ( uint8_t *  key,
uint8_t *  iv 
)

Set AES key and initialization vector.

Parameters:
key pointer to key data (16 bytes), 0 to preserve old key
iv pointer to IV/nonce data (16 bytes), 0 to preserve old IV
